member.summary: When bound to an object, this is the name of the property to bind to.

member.summary: The Path of the object to bind to for an unbound column. Key Still needs to be filled out.

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.DataType
member.summary: The DataType of the column. Must be set for dynamic columns for sorting or grouping to work.

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.FormatString
member.summary: The Format String for the DataType of the column.

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.Template
member.summary: A custom DataTemplate for this column. If not specified, it will use the appropriate default for the type.

member.summary: Indicates whether this column can be sorted

member.summary: Indicates whether this column can be Edited

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.IsExpandable
member.summary: Indicates whether this column can be expanded

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.Label
member.summary: The Column Label (Header) for unbound fields
member.remarks: Optional property, only applicable to unbound fields.

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.HorizontalAlignment
member.summary: The HorizontalAlignment of the whole column, including the header

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.Width
member.summary: The initial width of the column.
member.remarks: Use of ColumnWidth instead of Width is recommended. The Width property is kept for backward compatibility purpose.

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeColumn.ColumnWidth
member.summary: The width (in GridLength) of the column. ColumnWidth supports star (*) and Auto values.

member.summary: The minimum width of the column.

member.summary: The Visibility of the column.

member.summary: The Level of a grid-in-grid column. Default is 0 (the top level)

member.summary: Enable or disable filtering for this column

member.name: P:Eze.InfragisticsEx.EzeGrid.EnableColumnFiltering
member.summary: Enables Column level filtering on the datagrid (Note: Due to Infragistics limitations, we can only currently support column filtering with Eze filter logic on the top level columns) check with jmarston (or anyone from IMS Desktop framework team) for the timeline on this

member.Summary: Gets or Sets the DataType of the Members of the DataSource. Used for Column population.

member.name: T:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper
member.summary: This class serves as the data grid persistance intermediary between the view and the view model. To persist your grid, perform the following steps: 1) Add a XamDataGridPersistHelper property to the ViewModel (let's call if GridHelper) 2) From the corresponding View, add the attached property in the XamDataGrid: <igd:XamDataGrid XamDataGridPersistHelper.Binding="{Binding GridHelper}"> Then, call Serialize/Deserialize to convert the state of the grid control to/from XML string format.

member.name: M:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper.SetBinding(System.Windows.DependencyObject,Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper)
member.summary: Sets the value of the attached property Binding on the dependency object
member.param: The dependency object on which to set the value of attached property "XamDataGridPersistHelper.Binding"
The value to be set for the attached property "XamDataGridPersistHelper.Binding"

member.name: M:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper.GetBinding(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the value of the attached property Binding on the dependency object
member.param: The dependency object on which to get the value of attached property
member.returns: If dependency object has the attached property Binding then its value is returned

member.name: F:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper.BindingProperty
member.summary: This is an attached property which can be attached to dependency objects

member.name: M:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper.#ctor
member.Summary: Constructor, set the grid configuration to a new blank one.

member.name: M:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper.Serialize
member.Summary: Serializes the current grid configuration to XML for saving.

member.Summary: Deserializes a GridInfo from a string and loads the configuration into the grid.

member.name: M:Eze.InfragisticsEx.XamDataGridPersistHelper.Reset
member.Summary: Loads a new blank configuration into the grid.

member.summary: Gets the State property
